DOC.brief_summary: Our general aim is to investigate whether messenger RNA (mRNA) and/or microRNA (miRNA) expression profiles in white blood cells, predict metformin monotherapy efficacy in patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Gene Expression Profiles and Metformin Efficacy in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes (duration of diabetes of at least 2 years) age 4070 yrs HbA1c > 6.4 < 9.0 insulin therapy contraindications to metformin use
